name: AP_CLM_IF_MOE_PX_VALIDITY
description: Procedure validity indicators received by prospective payment systems (PPS) pricers that use the Medicaid Outpatient Editor (MOE). This table extracts the related multiple response item CLM-22315.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MOE_PX_VALIDITY
columns.description: Indicator of if the procedure is valid, or what is causing it to be invalid.
